reviewDetails.title: Review details
reviewDetails.description: Precise information concerning the time limits for the review procedures or contact information from which it can be obtained.

valueCalculationMethod.title: Value calculation method
valueCalculationMethod.description: The method used for calculating the estimated value of the concession.

legislativeReferences.title: Legislative references
legislativeReferences.description: Legislative references and associated contact points for information.

buyerProfile.title: Buyer profile URL
buyerProfile.description: The Web address of the buyer profile.

eDeliveryGateway.title: eDelivery gateway
eDeliveryGateway.description: The organization's URL for the exchange of data and documents with eDelivery.

valueCalculationMethod.title: Value calculation method
valueCalculationMethod.description: Any details relevant to the value of the concession according to article 8(3) of Directive 2014/23/EU on concession contracts.

periodRationale.title: Contract period rationale
periodRationale.description: The rationale for the duration of the contract.

publicPassengerTransportServicesKilomete.title: Kilometers of public passenger transport services
publicPassengerTransportServicesKilomete.description: The number of kilometers of public passenger transport services provided by a public service contract.

part.title: Part
part.description: The identifier of a part of a prior information notice, or another similar notice, that describes a planning process.

LegislativeReference.title: Legislative reference
LegislativeReference.description: Legislative reference and associated contact point

title.title: Title
title.description: The title of the legislative reference

url.title: URL
url.description: A link to the Web page of the legislative reference.

informationService.title: Information service
informationService.description: An organization that can provide information about the legislative reference.

awardPeriod.title: Award period
awardPeriod.description: The period for decision making regarding the contract award for the lot. The end date should be the date on which an award decision is due to be finalized. The start date may be used to indicate the start of an evaluation period.

hasAccessibilityCriteria.title: Has accessibility criteria
hasAccessibilityCriteria.description: Whether the technical specifications for the lot include accessibility criteria for people with disabilities.

noAccessibilityCriteriaRationale.title: No accessibility criteria rationale
noAccessibilityCriteriaRationale.description: The rationale for not including accessibility criteria when the object of the lot is intended for use by natural persons.

reviewDetails.title: Review details
reviewDetails.description: Precise information concerning the time limits for the review procedures for the lot or contact information from which it can be obtained.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: The sources in which the exclusion grounds are defined.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: The sources in which the selection criteria are defined.

foreignSubsidyMeasures.title: Foreign subsidy measures
foreignSubsidyMeasures.description: The measures applied under the Foreign Subsidies Regulation (EU) 2022/2560.
